title: C# 13 .NET 9 Compilation Issues
details:
Compilation Issues Analysis - .NET 9 C# 13 Upgrade

## Primary Issues Found (92 errors, 1 warning)

### 1. Target-typed new() Issues (CS8754)
- Error: "There is no target type for 'new()'"
- Cause: C# 13 target-typed new expressions failing with generic Mocks and complex types
- Solution: Use explicit type declarations instead of new()

### 2. Missing AppConfig Parameter (CS7036)  
- Error: "There is no argument given that corresponds to the required parameter 'appConfig' of 'MarkdownNoteBuilder.MarkdownNoteBuilder(IYamlHelper, AppConfig)'"
- Cause: MarkdownNoteBuilder constructor was updated to require AppConfig
- Solution: Add Mock<AppConfig> parameter to all MarkdownNoteBuilder instantiations

### 3. Obsolete Method Warning (CS0618)
- Warning: AppConfig.FindConfigFile() is obsolete
- Solution: Update to use ConfigurationSetup.DiscoverConfigurationFile()

## Fix Strategy
1. Create helper method for AppConfig mock setup
2. Fix target-typed new() issues by using explicit types
3. Update obsolete method calls
4. Apply fixes systematically across test files
